fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives: LINPRA follows initiatives and policies on High-level group of the European Digital Platforms and hubs of initiatives on digitising European industry.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit: LINPRA represents interests of companies, working in metal products, mashinery and equipment, electromechanics and electronics, plastics and rubber industry fields on international and national level. Our goal is to increase business competitiveness and internationalization, improve export of products and services, increase synergy between scientists and engineers activity. We take part in improving quality of VET (Vocational education and training) in Lithuania.
relevant_communication: Communication of LINPRA activities is implemented by means of mass media (articles on news portals) and own channels: on social networks, websites, direct communication to members and decision making organizations. LINPRA is involved in international projects and as an ambassador represents engineering industries of Lithuania in European conferences, match-making events etc. More information is available on: www.linpra.lt; http://www.industry40.lt/; https://www.facebook.com/inzinerine.pramone/; https://www.linkedin.com/company/10454553/.
